content.question: Let <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mi>f</mi></math> be the function with <math alttext="f of 0 equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mi>f</mi><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mn>0</mn></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> and derivative given by <math alttext="f prime of x equals, the cosine of x squared" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi>f</mi><mo>′</mo></msup><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mi>x</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded><mo>=</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mspace height="2.4ex"></mspace></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math>. Which of the following is the Maclaurin series for <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mi>f</mi></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the sum from n equals 0 to infinity, of, the fraction with numerator, open parenthesis, negative 1, close parenthesis, to the n power, times x raised to the 2 n power, and denominator, open parenthesis, 2 n, close parenthesis, factorial, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><munderover><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mi>∞</mi></munderover></mstyle><mfrac><mpadded><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>n</mi></msup><msup><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup></mpadded><mrow><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the sum from n equals 0 to infinity, of, the fraction with numerator, open parenthesis, negative 1, close parenthesis, to the n power, times x raised to the 4 n power, and denominator, open parenthesis, 2 n, close parenthesis, factorial, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><munderover><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mi>∞</mi></munderover></mstyle><mfrac><mpadded><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>n</mi></msup><msup><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup></mpadded><mrow><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the sum from n equals 0 to infinity, of, the fraction with numerator, open parenthesis, negative 1, close parenthesis, to the n power, times x raised to the 4 n plus 1, power, and denominator, open parenthesis, 4 n plus 1, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, 2 n, close parenthesis, factorial, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><munderover><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mi>∞</mi></munderover></mstyle><mfrac><mpadded><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>n</mi></msup><msup><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mpadded><mrow><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mn>4</mn><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the sum from n equals 0 to infinity, of, the fraction with numerator, open parenthesis, negative 1, close parenthesis, to the n power, times, open parenthesis, 4 n, close parenthesis, times x raised to the 4 n minus 1, power, and denominator, open parenthesis, open parenthesis, 2 n, close parenthesis, factorial, end fraction" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <munderover> <mo>∑</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>0</mn> </mrow> <mi>∞</mi> </munderover> </mstyle> <mfrac> <mpadded> <msup> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mpadded> <mo>-</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mpadded> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mi>n</mi> </msup> <mpadded> <mo>(</mo> <mpadded> <mn>4</mn> <mi>n</mi> </mpadded> <mo>)</mo> </mpadded> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mrow> <mn>4</mn> <mi>n</mi> <mo>-</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mpadded> <mrow> <mpadded> <mo>(</mo> <mpadded> <mn>2</mn> <mi>n</mi> </mpadded> <mo>)</mo> </mpadded> <mo>!</mo> </mrow> </mfrac> </math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the sum from n equals 0 to infinity, of, the fraction with numerator, open parenthesis, negative 1, close parenthesis, to the n power, times x raised to the 4 n plus 1, power, and denominator, open parenthesis, 4 n plus 1, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, 2 n, close parenthesis, factorial, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><munderover><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mi>∞</mi></munderover></mstyle><mfrac><mpadded><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>n</mi></msup><msup><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mpadded><mrow><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mn>4</mn><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></math>
